data.title: Princess Shuvekar
data.meta_description:
A picture for Princess Shuvekar wearing her tiara that was sold in the infamous auction in Cairo 1954
	Princess Shuvekar was the first wife of King Ahmed Fouad I , she did not have the title "Queen" Like Nazli, Because Ahmed Fouad did not become the king during their marriage 
	King Ahmed Fouad had two children from her , Prince Ismail who died in a very early age and Princess Fawakia , who was lost in history ,I barely found any records for her or pictures except one that was not too obvious 
	Princess Shuvekar suffered with King Fouad I as it was said that he a very nervous with bad drinking habbits that before her brother prince "Seif El-Din"; had shot him with a gun causing him to lose an eye 
	They had a divorce of course "Logically" where he married Nazli Sabri who was young compared to him 
	Princess Shuvekar married several times after her divorce , she had other children including Princess Latifa and Prince Wahid Seif 
	Princess Latifa was the first wife of Ahmed Pasha Hassanein,they were divorced after knowing that he was on affair with Queen Nazli "Yup, it was like a soap Opera"
	Prince Wahid Seif was accused unjustly to have an affair with Queen Farida , of course it was a disgusting rumor and the reason is below
	Already Princess Shuvekar was accused that she spoiled Farouk with her fancy parties ,introducing him to party girls the thing that made Queen Farida so angry that she left the palace once to her father's house 
	Most people said that it was the revenage of Shuvekar from Nazli from destroying her daughter's marriage
data.text:
A picture for Princess Shuvekar wearing her tiara that was sold in the infamous auction in Cairo 1954

Princess Shuvekar was the first wife of King Ahmed Fouad I , she did not have the title "Queen" Like Nazli, Because Ahmed Fouad did not become the king during their marriage

King Ahmed Fouad had two children from her , Prince Ismail who died in a very early age and Princess Fawakia , who was lost in history ,I barely found any records for her or pictures except one that was not too obvious

Princess Shuvekar suffered with King Fouad I as it was said that he a very nervous with bad drinking habbits that before her brother prince "Seif El-Din"; had shot him with a gun causing him to lose an eye

They had a divorce of course "Logically" where he married Nazli Sabri who was young compared to him

Princess Shuvekar married several times after her divorce , she had other children including Princess Latifa and Prince Wahid Seif

Princess Latifa was the first wife of Ahmed Pasha Hassanein,they were divorced after knowing that he was on affair with Queen Nazli "Yup, it was like a soap Opera"

Prince Wahid Seif was accused unjustly to have an affair with Queen Farida , of course it was a disgusting rumor and the reason is below

Already Princess Shuvekar was accused that she spoiled Farouk with her fancy parties ,introducing him to party girls the thing that made Queen Farida so angry that she left the palace once to her father's house

Most people said that it was the revenage of Shuvekar from Nazli from destroying her daughter's marriage
